official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend from one year to two years the period during which veterans with service-connected disabilities may apply for National Service Life Insurance.

summary.text: Extends from one year to two years the period during which eligible service-disabled veterans may apply for National Service Life Insurance.
